Installation instructions¶

PyPi (commings soon)¶

pip install cnnclustering

Manual installation¶

Clone the source repository https://github.com/janjoswig/CNN and use the package cnnclustering as you prefer it, e.g. install it via pip.

$ git clone https://github.com/janjoswig/CNN
$ cd CNN
$ pip install .

cnnclustering
